name: PixelOrb
description:
PixelOrb is a puzzle game where you need to find a right angle to see the picture. It's an open source project build with Godot Engine

Controls

Mouse, WASD or Arrow keys

Source Code

https://github.com/alex-karev/PixelOrb

Credits

The game contains sprites by Alex's Assets:

    https://alexs-assets.itch.io/16x16-rpg-item-pack
    https://alexs-assets.itch.io/16x16-rpg-item-pack

Music and sounds are done by KIS specially for this game
